Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the feedback from my teacher was more direct telling me my minute errors and giving me a feed back on how to resolve it whereas feedback from AI basically depends on how you frame your words they could possibly be wrong at times.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: yes the feedback from the teacher was much more easy to understand and helped me improve the next time on my own whereas in the feedback from ai it just alter the error for me without my information so that might have improved my work but did not really teach me anything.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: sometimes the feedback from AI seems very vague
